name: df-chr
body: |- wceq(cchr, cmpt(s0, universe, cfv(cfv(cod, cv(s0)), cfv(cur, cv(s0)))))
comment: The characteristic of a ring is the smallest positive integer which is equal to 0 when interpreted in the ring, or 0 if there is no such positive integer. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 5-Sep-2015.)
